name: Kickstarter Projects
special_instructions: The 'query' filter is used to search Kickstarter for a specific term.
The 'maxResults' filter is used to limit the number of results returned.
The 'category' filter is used to search within a specific category.
The 'location' filter is used to search within a specific location.
The 'status' filter is used to filter projects by their status.
The 'pledged' filter is used to filter projects by the amount pledged.
The 'goal' filter is used to filter projects by their goal amount.
The 'raised' filter is used to filter projects by the percentage of the goal amount that has been raised.
The 'sort' filter is used to sort the results.
The 'datasetName' filter is used to name the dataset for the run.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
